( A) Daily precipitation from the Climate Prediction Center (CPC) data, the Global Precipitation Climatology Project (GPCP) precipitation data ( 38), ERA reanalysis (12-h reforecast), and CRM simulation of the control case. The blue line is the mean of the three observations and reanalysis dataset. ( B) Daily precipitation of the control case and two perturbed cases. Error bars indicate the SD among six ensemble members, which are different realizations with small random noise in the initial conditions (
SI Appendix ). Numbers in brackets are the mean precipitation between May 22 and 26 (marked by the black vertical dash lines).
